<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i != NumLaneElts / 2; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(NewImm % NumLaneElts + s + l);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NewImm /= NumLaneElts;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumLaneElts == 4) NewImm = Imm; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reload imm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3df0419215a6ed24a6c29f8cf25aa4e5"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3df0419215a6ed24a6c29f8cf25aa4e5">decodeVSHUF64x2FamilyMask</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElts, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ScalarSize,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> l = 0; l != NumElts; l += NumElementsInLane) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Index = (Imm % NumLanes) &#42; NumElementsInLane;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Imm /= NumLanes; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Discard the bits we just used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We actually need the other source.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (l &gt;= (NumElts / 2))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i != NumElementsInLane; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Index + i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a56561a06c5e189905d213a05a0ab9273"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a56561a06c5e189905d213a05a0ab9273">DecodeVPERM2X128Mask</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElts, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imm,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HalfSize = NumElts / 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> l = 0; l != 2; ++l) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HalfMask = Imm &gt;&gt; (l &#42; 4);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HalfBegin = (HalfMask &amp; 0x3) &#42; HalfSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = HalfBegin, e = HalfBegin + HalfSize; i != e; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>((HalfMask &amp; 8) ? <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afaddf811d44f58e7d0e16ca3266b8689ac131901c70cd3380fd61a47415b58740">SM&#95;SentinelZero</a> : (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afb680fe35fd4d397b7d0674c45861008"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afb680fe35fd4d397b7d0674c45861008">DecodePSHUFBMask</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> RawMask, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;UndefElts,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = RawMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>(); i &lt; e; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t M = RawMask&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UndefElts&#91;i&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afaddf811d44f58e7d0e16ca3266b8689a3f112d168d45b1ab58a80c2b9f7e6cb4">SM&#95;SentinelUndef</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For 256/512-bit vectors the base of the shuffle is the 128-bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// subvector we&#39;re inside.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a> = (i / 16) &#42; 16;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the high bit (7) of the byte is set, the element is zeroed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (M &amp; (1 &lt;&lt; 7))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afaddf811d44f58e7d0e16ca3266b8689ac131901c70cd3380fd61a47415b58740">SM&#95;SentinelZero</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only the least significant 4 bits of the byte are used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Index = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a> + (M &amp; 0xf);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Index);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3d97ec8d51a9f56c4a2cff1f7a567b4e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3d97ec8d51a9f56c4a2cff1f7a567b4e">DecodeBLENDMask</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElts, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imm,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;int&gt;</a> &amp;ShuffleMask) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; NumElts; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are more than 8 elements in the vector, then any immediate blend</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mask wraps around.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Bit = i % 8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(((Imm &gt;&gt; Bit) &amp; 1) ? NumElts + i : i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab2ea0deda81eb9adf593b817b901fc1e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab2ea0deda81eb9adf593b817b901fc1e">DecodeVPPERMMask</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> RawMask, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;UndefElts,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;int&gt;</a> &amp;ShuffleMask) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(RawMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>() == 16 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Illegal VPPERM shuffle mask size&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// VPPERM Operation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Bits&#91;4:0&#93; - Byte Index (0 - 31)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Bits&#91;7:5&#93; - Permute Operation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Permute Operation:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 0 - Source byte (no logical operation).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 - Invert source byte.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 - Bit reverse of source byte.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3 - Bit reverse of inverted source byte.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 4 - 00h (zero - fill).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 5 - FFh (ones - fill).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 6 - Most significant bit of source byte replicated in all bit positions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 7 - Invert most significant bit of source byte and replicate in all bit positions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = RawMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>(); i &lt; e; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UndefElts&#91;i&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afaddf811d44f58e7d0e16ca3266b8689a3f112d168d45b1ab58a80c2b9f7e6cb4">SM&#95;SentinelUndef</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t M = RawMask&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t PermuteOp = (M &gt;&gt; 5) &amp; 0x7;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PermuteOp == 4) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afaddf811d44f58e7d0e16ca3266b8689ac131901c70cd3380fd61a47415b58740">SM&#95;SentinelZero</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PermuteOp != 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#aac0ea55010b7b1a301e65a0baea057aa">clear</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t Index = M &amp; 0x1F;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>((</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)Index);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3e3f786bc082e1485e1a863aab736513"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3e3f786bc082e1485e1a863aab736513">DecodeVPERMMask</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElts, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imm,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a01ddb8ea0c52fea9a3e87e46a10d00d8"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a01ddb8ea0c52fea9a3e87e46a10d00d8">DecodeZeroExtendMask</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SrcScalarBits, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DstScalarBits,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SrcScalarBits &lt; DstScalarBits &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a7efd1f0c1206d95e4fe01a9b49a57b82">append</a>(Scale - 1, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae9dabebeb083ad5885642b5e6a84c9c0a7b71dfec5c8dd524069eed634dc0a3a5">Sentinel</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a117aeb7b7429c5d944a693fbb4d1ac19"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a117aeb7b7429c5d944a693fbb4d1ac19">DecodeZeroMoveLowMask</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElts,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a7efd1f0c1206d95e4fe01a9b49a57b82">append</a>(NumElts - 1, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afaddf811d44f58e7d0e16ca3266b8689ac131901c70cd3380fd61a47415b58740">SM&#95;SentinelZero</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aaf783c4560c5874f3a0faa0036b2f00e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aaf783c4560c5874f3a0faa0036b2f00e">DecodeScalarMoveMask</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElts, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsLoad,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;int&gt;</a> &amp;ShuffleMask) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First element comes from the first element of second source.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remaining elements: Load zero extends / Move copies from first source.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(NumElts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 1; i &lt; NumElts; i++)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(IsLoad ? </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afaddf811d44f58e7d0e16ca3266b8689ac131901c70cd3380fd61a47415b58740">SM&#95;SentinelZero</a>) : i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3f561be3774824a1538c872d6b111718"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3f561be3774824a1538c872d6b111718">DecodeEXTRQIMask</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElts, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EltSize, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Len, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;int&gt;</a> &amp;ShuffleMask) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HalfElts = NumElts / 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only the bottom 6 bits are valid for each immediate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Len &amp;= 0x3F;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Idx &amp;= 0x3F;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can only decode this bit extraction instruction as a shuffle if both the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// length and index work with whole elements.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (0 != (Len % EltSize) || 0 != (Idx % EltSize))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A length of zero is equivalent to a bit length of 64</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Len == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Len = 64;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the length + index exceeds the bottom 64 bits the result is undefined.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Len + Idx) &gt; 64) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a7efd1f0c1206d95e4fe01a9b49a57b82">append</a>(NumElts, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afaddf811d44f58e7d0e16ca3266b8689a3f112d168d45b1ab58a80c2b9f7e6cb4">SM&#95;SentinelUndef</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Convert index and index to work with elements.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Len /= EltSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Idx /= EltSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// EXTRQ: Extract Len elements starting from Idx. Zero pad the remaining</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// elements of the lower 64-bits. The upper 64-bits are undefined.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i != Len; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(i + Idx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = Len; i != (int)HalfElts; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afaddf811d44f58e7d0e16ca3266b8689ac131901c70cd3380fd61a47415b58740">SM&#95;SentinelZero</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = HalfElts; i != (int)NumElts; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afaddf811d44f58e7d0e16ca3266b8689a3f112d168d45b1ab58a80c2b9f7e6cb4">SM&#95;SentinelUndef</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a853d1016b3f70fa9b00fbac31da2cc70"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a853d1016b3f70fa9b00fbac31da2cc70">DecodeINSERTQIMask</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElts, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EltSize, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Len, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;int&gt;</a> &amp;ShuffleMask) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HalfElts = NumElts / 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only the bottom 6 bits are valid for each immediate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Len &amp;= 0x3F;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Idx &amp;= 0x3F;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can only decode this bit insertion instruction as a shuffle if both the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// length and index work with whole elements.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (0 != (Len % EltSize) || 0 != (Idx % EltSize))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A length of zero is equivalent to a bit length of 64</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Len == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Len = 64;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the length + index exceeds the bottom 64 bits the result is undefined.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Len + Idx) &gt; 64) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a7efd1f0c1206d95e4fe01a9b49a57b82">append</a>(NumElts, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afaddf811d44f58e7d0e16ca3266b8689a3f112d168d45b1ab58a80c2b9f7e6cb4">SM&#95;SentinelUndef</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Convert index and index to work with elements.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Len /= EltSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Idx /= EltSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// INSERTQ: Extract lowest Len elements from lower half of second source and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// insert over first source starting at Idx element. The upper 64-bits are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// undefined.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i != Idx; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i != Len; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(i + NumElts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = Idx + Len; i != (int)HalfElts; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = HalfElts; i != (int)NumElts; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afaddf811d44f58e7d0e16ca3266b8689a3f112d168d45b1ab58a80c2b9f7e6cb4">SM&#95;SentinelUndef</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19ed1906d1fc3026d1bf29313dfcfa68"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19ed1906d1fc3026d1bf29313dfcfa68">DecodeVPERMILPMask</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElts, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ScalarBits,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> RawMask, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;UndefElts,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;int&gt;</a> &amp;ShuffleMask) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VecSize = NumElts &#42; ScalarBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumLanes = VecSize / 128;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumEltsPerLane = NumElts / NumLanes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((VecSize == 128 || VecSize == 256 || VecSize == 512) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unexpected vector size&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((ScalarBits == 32 || ScalarBits == 64) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unexpected element size&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = RawMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>(); i &lt; e; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UndefElts&#91;i&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afaddf811d44f58e7d0e16ca3266b8689a3f112d168d45b1ab58a80c2b9f7e6cb4">SM&#95;SentinelUndef</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t M = RawMask&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">    M = (ScalarBits == 64 ? ((M &gt;&gt; 1) &amp; 0x1) : (M &amp; 0x3));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LaneOffset = i &amp; ~(NumEltsPerLane - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>((</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)(LaneOffset + M));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5fb0db87ada1b48888e070c009007845"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5fb0db87ada1b48888e070c009007845">DecodeVPERMIL2PMask</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElts, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ScalarBits, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> M2Z,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> RawMask, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;UndefElts,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;int&gt;</a> &amp;ShuffleMask) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VecSize = NumElts &#42; ScalarBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumLanes = VecSize / 128;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumEltsPerLane = NumElts / NumLanes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((VecSize == 128 || VecSize == 256) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unexpected vector size&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((ScalarBits == 32 || ScalarBits == 64) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unexpected element size&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((NumElts == RawMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>()) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unexpected mask size&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = RawMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>(); i &lt; e; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UndefElts&#91;i&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afaddf811d44f58e7d0e16ca3266b8689a3f112d168d45b1ab58a80c2b9f7e6cb4">SM&#95;SentinelUndef</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// VPERMIL2 Operation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Bits&#91;3&#93; - Match Bit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Bits&#91;2:1&#93; - (Per Lane) PD Shuffle Mask.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Bits&#91;2:0&#93; - (Per Lane) PS Shuffle Mask.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t Selector = RawMask&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MatchBit = (Selector &gt;&gt; 3) &amp; 0x1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// M2Z&#91;0:1&#93;     MatchBit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   0Xb           X        Source selected by Selector index.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   10b           0        Source selected by Selector index.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   10b           1        Zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   11b           0        Zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   11b           1        Source selected by Selector index.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((M2Z &amp; 0x2) != 0 &amp;&amp; MatchBit != (M2Z &amp; 0x1)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afaddf811d44f58e7d0e16ca3266b8689ac131901c70cd3380fd61a47415b58740">SM&#95;SentinelZero</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Index = i &amp; ~(NumEltsPerLane - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ScalarBits == 64)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Index += (Selector &gt;&gt; 1) &amp; 0x1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Index += Selector &amp; 0x3;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Src = (Selector &gt;&gt; 2) &amp; 0x1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Index += Src &#42; NumElts;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Index);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
